sys_metadata_link.payload:
10 While many force users seek to use their powers to interact with other living beings or enhance their own abilities, some are more attuned to how the force affects and modifies machinery.  These characters apply the force to affect components and circuity on a molecular level, allowing them to better craft and repair items.  Whether helping patch up a landspeeder's power converter or facilitating intricate alterations in a computer's logic circuitry, the force power Manipulate can greatly increase the efficacy of any repair work, crafting efforts, or item creation.

Such force users can perform astonishing feats to keep ships running despite horrendous damage, and can push vehicles far past normal mechanical limits.  Although the force cannot touch the circuits that form a "mind" of a droid, this power can alter a droid or other machine's physical components to allow force users greater combat effectiveness against mechanical adversaries or enemy vehicles.

BASIC POWER

The force user shapes machine components on a molecular level, allowing better crafting and repairing of items.

The force user may spend 1 force point to cause one vehicle or starship he is engaged with to recover one system strain.  The user may activate this multiple times, increasing the system strain recovered by one each time.

]]> 1 Manipulate FORCE0001017 ben.fisher 2022-04-18 15:21:37 7a77d27b2f7e8910e0f497eef699b6af 0 ben.fisher 2022-04-18 15:21:37
